paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation.
address: 20 Vesey Street, Suite 700, New York, NY 10007
valueProp: Pazer, Epstein, Jaffe & Fein, P.C. is a respected law firm in New York City with a track record of success in securing just financial compensation for their clients. They are known for their ethics, dedication, and experience in handling personal injury cases.
